mapper.sql: source_id, source_name, source_position, source_address, source_property, source_area, source_characteristic, source_price, source_total_price, source_developer, source_time, source_users_no
mapper.select:
select
from source_collection
and source_name like concat(concat('%',#{sourceName}),'%')
and source_property like concat(concat('%',#{sourceProperty}),'%')
and source_price like concat(concat('%',#{sourcePrice}),'%')
and source_total_rice like concat(concat('%',#{sourceTotalPrice}),'%')
order by source_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into source_collection (source_name, source_position, source_address, source_property, source_area, source_characteristic, source_price, source_total_price, source_developer, source_time, source_users_no) values (#{sourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sourceCharacteristic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sourceTotalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sourceDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceUsersNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update source_collection
source_name = #{sourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_position = #{sourcePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_address = #{sourceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_property = #{sourceProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_area = #{sourceArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_characteristic = #{sourceCharacteristic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_price = #{sourcePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
source_total_price = #{sourceTotalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
source_developer = #{sourceDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_time = #{sourceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
source_users_no = #{sourceUsersNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
